title: Steam-promoted Symmetry Optimizations on Perovskite Electrodes for Protonic Ceramic Cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02233E, Paper
Feng Zhu, Mingyang Hou, Zhiwei Du, Fan He, Yangsen Xu, Kang Xu, Hui Gao, Ying Liu, Yu Chen
Perovskite oxides have attracted considerable attention because of their charming properties for electrocatalysis, photocatalysis, and membrane-catalysis for energy storage/conversion. Optimization of their crystal symmetry in tuning the electrocatalytic activity within...
